body_html:
I tested it with the reverted code and then it works.
Another interesting thing is that with tfnightly I get the

INFO:tensorflow:Create CheckpointSaverHook.
INFO:tensorflow:Create CheckpointSaverHook.

twice. And also 2x

INFO:tensorflow:Saving checkpoints for 1 into tmp/adversarial\model.ckpt.
INFO:tensorflow:Saving checkpoints for 1 into tmp/adversarial\model.ckpt.

Another interesting thing is that with tfnightly I get the

body:
I tested it with the reverted code and then it works.
Another interesting thing is that with tfnightly I get the
```
INFO:tensorflow:Create CheckpointSaverHook.
INFO:tensorflow:Create CheckpointSaverHook.
```
twice. And also 2x
```
INFO:tensorflow:Saving checkpoints for 1 into tmp/adversarial\model.ckpt.
INFO:tensorflow:Saving checkpoints for 1 into tmp/adversarial\model.ckpt.
```
